fullplot: Helen is the young girlfriend of good-looking Jackson Baring. When Helen gets pregnant and marries Jackson, they decide to move to his hometown, Kilronan, and have a baby there. But his mother Martha, who lives there, starts to do weird things, and obviously she's not too friendly to Helen.

title: Hush

tomatoes.consensus: A ridiculous but wholly predictable potboiler with performances ranging from comatose to hysterical.
